name: Jocko McShorts
answers: I recommend making what's called a "dook swirlie", which is one pound of chocolate, half a gallon of buttermilk, several fistfuls of wheat grass, one cheddar brick, all the ice cubes in the freezer, and a turkey leg - run it through a blender for 5 min, shotgun that sucker in one gulp and hold in the urge to vomit

It's simple: You're not holding your breath long enough. If you blow out an eardrum, you're doing it right. I've been deaf for years, and it's great for ignoring people who talk to me when I'm trying to lift!
comments: That's all well and good, but if you want to get truly buff, you're need to do about three sets of 20 levitating sasquatches, followed by 10 full-body smart toasters, and then cool down with a pygmy lung stretch
{name}, I suggest you adjust your lifting schedule to something more incremental, like 10,000 kilograms thirteen times a day instead of 130,000 all at once.
When you really want killer definition in your quadrophenius dingletoids, crotch squats are the right kind of pain!
